siteProductLine.name: Turf Saver
siteProductLine.overview:
The Carlstar/Carlisle Turf Saver is a lawn and garden tire specially designed for those who are looking for minimal grass compaction and extended wear. This tire is one of the most popular turf tread tires by Carlstar/Carlisle as it has been used as original equipment for lawn mowers built by popular mower manufacturers like John Deere, Toro, and Jacobson. Ideal for garden tractors, walk-behinds, golf carts, snow blowers, turf maintenance vehicles, and utility vehicles, the Carlstar/Carlisle Turf Saver features a tread which provides superior grip without damaging the grass underneath. The broad-shouldered design and extra-wide footprint helps you maintain stability; grass may not be as intimidating as other trails but some balance should still be maintained in order to perform your job well. The Carlstar/Carlisle Turf Saver is an outstanding choice for garden and lawn applications. It understands your need to protect your lawn without compromising on traction.

Features & Benefits
  • Ideally used for lawn mowers, golf carts, tractors, and utility vehicles for its minimal grass compaction
  • Enhanced durability with its broad-shouldered, puncture resistant construction
  • Extra wide footprint delivers stability you need to move on wide expanses of grass seamlessly
  • Carlisle branded tires are now Carlstar, and offer the same excellent performance, durability, and value that they have for the past 100 years

siteProductSpecs.name: Vehicle
siteProductSpecs.description: Lawn & Garden tires are built for use on riding or commercial mowers and offer drivers strong traction without the risk of compacting grass or turf.

siteProductSpecs.name: Mileage Warranty
siteProductSpecs.description: This product is not covered by a manufacturer’s treadlife warranty.

siteProductSpecs.name: Load Range
siteProductSpecs.description: The maximum load carrying strength at the specified inflation pressure, also known as ply rating.

siteProductSpecs.name: Sidewall
siteProductSpecs.description: The side of the tire between the tread and rim, with cosmetic branding as well as information about the tire including manufacturer, model, size, etc.

siteProductSpecs.name: Part Number
siteProductSpecs.description: An identifier of a particular tire line and size combination assigned by the tire manufacturer.

siteProductSpecs.name: Tread Design
siteProductSpecs.description: Tread design (or tread pattern) can affect handling, traction & noise for different driving styles & road conditions.

siteProductSpecs.name: Overall Diameter
siteProductSpecs.description: The diameter of a tire that is inflated without any load applied.
